fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: Providing better access to online platforms' data and a secure space to analyse and exchange information; Launching a secure European online platform on disinformation to support the independent European network of fact-checkers and relevant academic researchers.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
source: Members of Europe Parliament (Groups ALDE, others)
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit:
Demaskuok means - DEBUNK! 
Resist disinformation together! 
the NATIONAL INITIATIVE that unites the largest media sources, society, and the state, combined with unique tools and multiple levels of algorithms with one purpose – fighting disinformation.
relevant_communication:
Communication from the Commission to the European Parliament, the Council, the European Economic and Social Committee and the Committee of the Regions. Tackling online disinformation: a European Approach. 8578/18 
 
http://demaskuok.lt/
